text: Eugeni Casanova i Solanes (born in Lleida, February 9, 1958) is a writer, documentary filmmaker, journalist and philosopher from Lleida. He holds a degree in Information Sciences ( UAB ) and Philosophy ( UB ), and a doctorate in Catalan Language and Literature (UAB). He has worked for Avui, El Periódico de Catalunya, La Vanguardia, Tiempo, Cadena SER and Televisión Española. His work has been translated into Spanish. He was also the co- director of the documentary Catalunya Nord, la llengua enyorada, which won the award for best documentary at the 2020 International Catalan Film Festival (FIC-CAT). == Published work == ** L'ós del Pirineu.
